explanation: [0-0] In an indoor environment, a little girl in a black training suit is fighting with an adult woman. The little girl has a serious expression, as if she is undergoing some kind of training. There are white and black subtitles in the upper right corner of the screen.

[0-2] Then the picture suddenly switches to another scene. A young man with curly hair, wearing a purple T-shirt, appears in a dimly lit room. He has a slight smile on his face. A broken heart appears on the screen, and the man suddenly turns his head and makes an exaggerated expression, as if frightened by something.
